languages.text: Мертвый страж прибит к земле лезвием собственного сломанного кинжала, который воткнули под самый подбородок — так, чтобы жертва долго задыхалась.

traits.locale_text: Мертвый страж прибит к земле лезвием собственного сломанного кинжала, который воткнули под самый подбородок — так, чтобы жертва долго задыхалась.

languages.text: The dead warden is pinned to the ground with the blade of their own broken dagger — it was plunged right under their chin to ensure that the victim slowly choked to death.
languages.original_text: Мертвый страж прибит к земле лезвием собственного сломанного кинжала, который воткнули под самый подбородок — так, чтобы жертва долго задыхалась.

traits.locale_text: The dead guard is pinned to the ground with the blade of the guard's own broken dagger — it is plunged right under the chin to make the victim choke slowly.
The dead guard is pinned to the ground with the blade of the guard's own broken dagger — it is plunged right under the chin to make the victim choke slowly.
The dead guard is pinned to the ground with the blade of their own broken dagger — it was plunged right under their chin to ensure that the victim slowly choked to death.
The dead guard is pinned to the ground with the blade of their own broken dagger — it was plunged right under their chin to ensure that the victim slowly choked to death.
The dead warden is pinned to the ground with the blade of their own broken dagger — it was plunged right under their chin to ensure that the victim slowly choked to death.

languages.text: El guardia muerto está clavado al suelo por el filo de su propia daga rota. Se insertó debajo del mentón para asegurarse de que se ahogaba lentamente.
languages.original_text: The dead warden is pinned to the ground with the blade of their own broken dagger — it was plunged right under their chin to ensure that the victim slowly choked to death.

traits.locale_text: El guardia muerto está clavado al suelo por el filo de su propia daga rota. Se insertó debajo del mentón para asegurarse de que se ahogaba lentamente.

languages.text: 死去的守卫被自己匕首折断的刀刃钉在地上。匕首正好插在这个人的下巴上，确保这个人会一点一点窒息而死。
languages.original_text: The dead warden is pinned to the ground with the blade of their own broken dagger — it was plunged right under their chin to ensure that the victim slowly choked to death.

traits.locale_text: 死去的守卫被自己匕首折断的刀刃钉在地上。匕首正好插在这个人的下巴上，确保这个人会一点一点窒息而死。

languages.text: 死んだワーデンは自らの折れたダガーの刃で地面に釘刺されている。じわじわと窒息死するように、顎の真下を刺されている。
languages.original_text: The dead warden is pinned to the ground with the blade of their own broken dagger — it was plunged right under their chin to ensure that the victim slowly choked to death.

traits.locale_text: 死んだ監視兵は自らの折れたダガーの刃で地面に釘刺されている――じわじわと窒息死するように、顎の真下を刺されている。

languages.text: Der tote Wächter wurde mit der Klinge seines eigenen zerbrochenen Dolchs an den Boden geheftet – sie wurde direkt unter dem Kinn eingestochen, um zu gewährleisten, dass der Tod langsam durch Ersticken erfolgte.
languages.original_text: The dead warden is pinned to the ground with the blade of their own broken dagger — it was plunged right under their chin to ensure that the victim slowly choked to death.

traits.locale_text: Der tote Wächter wurde mit der Klinge seines eigenen zerbrochenen Dolchs an den Boden geheftet – sie wurde direkt unter dem Kinn eingestochen, um zu gewährleisten, dass der Tod langsam durch Ersticken erfolgte.

languages.text: Le gardien est cloué au sol par la lame de sa propre dague brisée. Son assaillant l'a plantée juste sous son menton pour qu'il suffoque lentement jusqu'à ce que mort s'ensuive.
languages.original_text: The dead warden is pinned to the ground with the blade of their own broken dagger — it was plunged right under their chin to ensure that the victim slowly choked to death.

traits.locale_text: Le gardien est cloué au sol par la lame de sa propre dague brisée. Son assaillant l'a plantée juste sous son menton pour qu'il suffoque lentement jusqu'à ce que mort s'ensuive.

languages.text: Ölü dizdar, kendi kırık hançerinin bıçağıyla yere sabitlenmiş. Kurbanın boğularak yavaş yavaş ölmesi için tam çenesinin altından sokulmuş.
languages.original_text: The dead warden is pinned to the ground with the blade of their own broken dagger — it was plunged right under their chin to ensure that the victim slowly choked to death.

traits.locale_text: Ölü muhafız, kendi kırık hançerinin bıçağıyla yere sabitlenmiş. Kurbanın boğularak yavaş yavaş ölmesi için tam çenesinin altından sokulmuş.
